Title: Invini.Training
Description: Toolkit for writing training scripts for beginning users of your application. Write training and demo scenarios in easy way!
HomeWiki:
SUMMARY

With this toolkit you may write training scripts that guide your beggining users through your WPF application.

Scenarios in which the library is helpful:
  • you want to teach clients how your application works,
  • you want to demonstrate your application to potential clients,
  • you want to prepare constant set of test scenarios for your testers.
Especialy, the library is really helpful when these tasks are performed remotely with Remote Desktop Services or other remoting technologies.

You should start by downloading Samples with some demo projects which may be used to learn how to use the library. Refer Documentation for details.
